text:
I don't think there's a solution for this yet.

One thing that might be cool is if we could add the analytics features of HubSpot CTAs to any react button through a hook or provider of some sort.

We'd probably need more people pushing for that idea to make it happen
That would be incredibly useful, for sure.

In the short term and in case someone has the same issue, it looks like this might do the trick: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/ctas/create-calls-to-action#layout>

(still would be great to have a hook or something like that, though)
